original_text: Esther's female servants the eunuchs who took care of her told her what Mordecai was doing. So Esther was very upset. She sent clothes for Mordecai to put on instead of the sackcloth, but Mordecai refused to wear them.
korean_text: 에스더의 시녀와 내시가 나아와 전하니 왕후가 매우 근심하여 입을 의복을 모르드개에게 보내어 그 굵은 베 옷을 벗기고자 하나 모르드개가 받지 아니하는지라

sentences.original_text: the eunuchs who took care of her
told her what Mordecai was doing
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 하고 있는 일을 그녀에게 알렸다

sentences.original_text: but Mordecai refused to wear them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 모르드개는 그 옷을 입기를 거부했다
